extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of (6.0 units from GPHY227; GPHY228; GPHY229) or (3.0 units at the 200 level  or above in GNDS), or permission of the Department.

basic.description: Gender in relationship to the spatial organization of contemporary Western cities. Emphasis on the diversity of gendered experiences of the city, gender and urban form, housing, social movements, the geography of work, and gender symbols in the urban landscape.
basic.subject: GPHY
basic.title: Gender and the City
